segments.advisor_message: Alright, so to get started, can you tell me your full name? Like your first name, middle names if ya have any, and your last name?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, sure! I’m, like, my name’s Alex, uh, and my, uh, last name’s Johnson. I don’t really have any middle names.

segments.advisor_message: Great! And do you go by anything else, like a nickname? Also, what’s your date of birth?
segments.client_message: Ohh, yeah, I’m like, people call me Al, and, um, I was born on, like, the 05-12-1990.  It’s all good, I mean, haha!
